Title: Thriller Theater!
Writer: Steven Warren Hill, Michael S. Olson, Nick Seidler, Robert Warnock
Actors: Steven Warren Hill, Robert Warnock, Benjamin Nicholson, Aliza Skolnik
Plot: Thirty-something geek Tom Stewart has always loved cheap old horror and monster movies. He's decided to pursue a dream to create a horror host TV show in an age when infomercials are more ...
